definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Using low pass filters before the readout device may also reduce bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 在讀出設備之前採用低通濾波器也可以減小帶寬。

sentences.english: The relation between the filter sampling time and cutting error is fuzzed .
sentences.chinese: 將濾波器的採樣時間與剪切誤差之間的關係模糊化。

sentences.english: The theory provided a new way to fabricate ultra-narrow optical filters.
sentences.chinese: 這將爲設計一種全新的濾波器提供指導。

sentences.english: Then the thesis analyzed the significance of applying unscented kalman filter to inverted pendulum system.
sentences.chinese: 分析無跡卡爾曼濾波算法在倒立擺系統上應用的意義。

sentences.english: The last 4 times decimation was achieved by two half-band filters and a droop FIR.
sentences.chinese: 剩餘4倍抽取採用兩級半帶濾波器和升幅FIR實現。

sentences.english: The median filter or maximum-minimum exclusive mean filter is selected according tod.
sentences.chinese: 根據選擇中值濾波或最大最小排除均值濾波。

sentences.english: The median filter or maximum-minimum exclusive mean filter is selected according tod.
sentences.chinese: 根據選擇中值濾波或最大最小排除均值濾波。

sentences.english: Multi-scale edge detection based on over-sampled filter banks is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究基於過採樣濾波器組的多尺度邊緣檢測算法。

sentences.english: A family of new hyperstable adaptive recursive filter algorithms are presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一類新的超穩定自適應遞歸濾波算法。

sentences.english: Finally, the filtered image is thresholded to produce the edge image.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對濾波圖像閾值化以得到噪聲圖像的邊緣圖。

sentences.english: In addition, the manufacturing advantages known from E-plane technology are maintained.
sentences.chinese: 而且，雙工器中的濾波器保持了E面的製造加工優勢。

sentences.english: Wavelet transform and Wiener filtering are combined to denoise speech.
sentences.chinese: 將小波變換與維納濾波結合起來對語音進行去噪。

sentences.english: This paper presents a particle filter-based algorithm for IR target-tracking.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於粒子濾波的紅外目標跟蹤的新算法。

sentences.english: Inuduction responses result from nonlinear-time-variable filtering of formation properties.
sentences.chinese: 感應測井響應是地層非線性時變濾波的結果。

sentences.english: Formulas are derived for the solution of the transient currents of dissipative low-pass T-type electric wave filters.
sentences.chinese: 此篇先推求收端加電阻時，低頻濾波器瞬流之公式。

sentences.english: This paper design a 4-step band pass digital filter.
sentences.chinese: 本文設計了一個4階帶通數字濾波器。
